Title: Azure Search Scoring Profiles Demo
Description: This is a C# Windows console application that uses fictional data to demonstrate the behaviors of scoring profiles in Azure Search.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This demo is no longer maintained. For information on how to use the Scoring capabilities of Azure Search please visit https://github.com/Azure-Samples/search-dotnet-asp-net-mvc-jobs and for specific implementation, please visit https://github.com/Azure-Samples/search-dotnet-asp-net-mvc-jobs/blob/master/NYCJobsWeb/JobsSearch.cs
